params.serviceProvider: address(0) = STANDARD (winner withdraws); else ESCROW_LINKED (payout locked for provider).

emergencyRefund(uint256).details: Admin: refund escrow to winner in case of dispute / emergency.

releaseFunds(uint256).details: Winner confirms service received; funds go to provider.

withdraw().details: STANDARD tontine: winner pulls their payout.
